recap_documents.description: MINUTES IN CHAMBERS - ORDER RE DEFENDANT CARSTEN BREITFELD'S MOTION TO DISMISS 22 by Judge Dolly M. Gee. For the foregoing reasons, the Court GRANTS in part and DENIES in part Breitfeld's MTD. The Court also determines that Plaintiffs will not be able to cure the defects identified above regarding their seventh and eighth causes of action even if given the chance to amend their Complaint. The Court therefore DENIES leave to amend. Breitfeld shall file his Answer to the Complaint no later than May 19, 2020. See minute order for details. (lom) (Entered: 04/28/2020)
